messages.title: My plan
messages.content: Douglas is Working for Walsall and for You. Using his energy, experience and passion to speak for you.

messages.title: Let's stay on the road to a stronger economy
messages.content: Britain has started growing again. But there's more to do:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Eliminate the deficit, Bring down our debt, Competitive business taxes to create more jobs
Keep job taxes down, All young people working or in training - earning or learning, 3 million new apprenticeships
Raise personal allowance to £12,500, 40p rate only when you earn over £50,000, Delivering tax-free childcare
All pupils studying the core subjects at GCSE, Competitive excellent school places, Raising the status of the teaching profession
Reduce the benefit cap to £23,000 a year, Benefits frozen for 2 years, The toughest system on welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe
Pass on your pension tax-free, Protecting the triple lock, Integrating health and social care to improve care in retirement

issues.brexitEurope: The toughest system on welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe
issues.economy: Eliminate the deficit, Bring down our debt, Competitive business taxes to create more jobs
issues.education: All pupils studying the core subjects at GCSE, Competitive excellent school places, Raising the status of the teaching profession
issues.health: Integrating health and social care to improve care in retirement
issues.immigration: The toughest system on welfare for EU migrants anywhere in Europe
issues.socialWelfare: Reduce the benefit cap to £23,000 a year, Benefits frozen for 2 years

quotes.text: In August I'll be travelling with young students to the Source of the Nile. What can be imagined can be achieved...

leaflet.additionalNotes: Find out more about our long-term economic plan for Britain: facebook.com/conservatives
